The Bitcoin halvening is NOT priced in.  tl;dr:  The halvening is a mechanism that triggers a price rise that in turn attracts people and money to bitcoin. The price then settles at the new stock-to-flow price level until the next supply shock.  Thread.

1/5 Blind Merged Mining (BMM) for #Bitcoin  BMM is the idea of committing the hash of another blockchain into a unique location of a block by paying miners. This increases the BTC hashrate without increasing the validation burden. The idea was first conceived of by @Truthcoin  👇
